bug.short_desc: Image combine does not work with ImageMagick 6.6.2-6 2010-12-02 Q16

long_desc.thetext:
@Thomas: As requested ... ;-)
Versions: * qooxdoo SVN rev 26799 * ImageMagick 6.6.2-6 2010-12-02 Q16
Description: The image montage command in qooxdoo/tool/pylib/generator/resource/ImageClipping.py with option "-background None" causes a black background color if you are using the above mentioned version of ImageMagick (comes with Ubuntu 10.10).
It seems to be an ImageMagick bug. Setting color constants or hex values does not help either. The background color remains black and you get the following error message: "montage: unrecognized color `magick' @ warning/color.c/GetColorInfo/946."
